description:
Actor Wesley Snipes portrayed the titular character in Blade, Blade II, and Blade: Trinity, all of which helped make Marvel the popular brand that it is today. Now Wesley Snipes has responded to a rumor that he could be appearing in Deadpool & Wolverine – which would officially bring his character into the Marvel Cinematic [...]

The post Wesley Snipes Responds To Blade MCU Return Rumor appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Wesley Snipes Responds To Blade MCU Return Rumor

description:
The 2021 horror film The Black Phone, directed by Scott Derrickson and written by Derrickson with C. Robert Cargill, was a massive success for Blumhouse and Universal in 2021. It made $161.4 million at the box office with a budget between $16-18 million. A sequel was announced not too long ago, though Universal has confirmed [...]

The post ‘The Black Phone 2’ Gets October 2025 Release Date appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Black Phone 2’ Gets October 2025 Release Date

description:
The most recent Spider-Man installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: No Way Home, proved that just about anything is possible within the MCU. Fans were delighted to see fan-favorite superheroes and supervillains appear, several of which were killed off years ago. Now it looks like the MCU’s Spider-Man 4 is rumored to include another [...]

The post ‘Spider-Man 4’ Rumored To Include Surprise Marvel MCU Return appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Spider-Man 4’ Rumored To Include Surprise Marvel MCU Return
